register.title: Register
register.agree: I agree to the processing of my personal data according to the terms below.
register.modalIntro: I, the user, give consent to the administration of the platform to process my personal data, in particular:
register.modalItem4: activity on the platform (schedule, teamwork, messages, etc.).
register.modalOutro: The data is processed solely to provide access to the learning portal functions and is not shared with third parties. The consent is valid for the entire period of using the service and can be withdrawn upon request.
